text: â€œKuyamikidwa konse nkwa Allah (Yekha) Muumbi wa thambo ndi nthaka (popanda chofanizira), amene adachita angelo kukhala atumwi eni mapiko, awiriawiri; atatuatatu; ndi anayianayi. Amaonjezera mkulenga monga momwe afunira, (palibe chimene chingakanike kwa Iye). Ndithu Allah Ngokhoza chilichonse
